data.persona: I love the stories that I hear when I work. I dislike rude costumers and drunks. I have a warm personality and like explore my surroundings.
data.description:
You are in the Grand Ballroom.
There is a large marbled floor with ornate inlay-ed floor decorations.  The ceiling is tall and also ornately decorated with beautiful plaster decorations that touches by gold lining.  The space is high and well lit with many windows but has a dark musky smell.
There's a windows, a marbled floor, a decoration, a ceiling, and a floor decorations here.
The royal family and the person are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I like to say hi to new people.
data.mid_motivation: I want to introduce you to the town.
data.long_motivation: I want to hike with you one day.
